ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 8
ComicInfo.Summary: Chapter 8: Two-Face, Solomon Grundy, and Madame Crow provide a distraction to draw out Batman so that Red Hood can sneak into the new Batcave to steal the Lazarus Resin sample, but Jason is confronted by Barbara, Dick, Tim, and Cassandra. Meanwhile, Bloom pursues his own agenda at Powers International by experimenting on Man-Bat.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 17:28:48. [CVDB926027] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:50:21. [Issue ID 2404034]
